name: Granny come Granny go
description:
Our player's parents died in a tragic accident. Being left alone in the world, the 11-year-old player is determined to search for their long-lost grandmother.  They gathered every information found in their house, combined the facts, and left to find the indicated spot drawn in their map. 

In a fast-paced world, this game was created in order to give the player the opportunity to learn from the wisdom of elderly people. While the player walks at all times behind the grandparents, they tell their story revealing information about their world, and at the same time, they are giving hints on how to play the puzzles. 

Credits:

  • Emil Reinert: Programming / Concept / 3D Art 
  • Eirini Kokkinidou: Story / Animation
  • Maria Nicolas: Character Design
